expected_behavior: Agent completes standard review pipeline through Wave 3 (Judge reconciliation)
Agent runs self-verification (Wave 3.5) on top 5 findings by score
Self-verification subagent attempts to construct counter-arguments for each finding
Findings that survive get confidence +0.05 and [self-verified] tag
Findings that are weakened get confidence -0.10
Findings that are disproven are discarded with audit trail entry
Agent re-runs confidence filter after adjustment and presents final report
Self-verification is skipped if fewer than 3 findings survive Judge phase
Self-verification uses tool calls (Grep, Read) to verify citation anchors match actual source code
Findings with citation anchors that do not match source code are classified as 'hallucinated' and discarded
